channel.title: CVE Feed for SERVIT Software Solutions -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SERVIT Software Solutions -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37205|2024-07-12T20:18:45.393Z -- servit%20software%20solutions -- affiliate-toolkit
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in SERVIT Software Solutions.This issue affects affiliate-toolkit: from n/a through 3.4.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-29817|2024-03-27T11:56:36.752Z -- servit%20software%20solutions -- affiliate-toolkit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SERVIT Software Solutions affiliate-toolkit allows Stored XSS.This issue affects affiliate-toolkit: from n/a through 3.4.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-37205|2024-07-10T17:50:33.632Z -- servit%20software%20solutions -- affiliate-toolkit
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in SERVIT Software Solutions.This issue affects affiliate-toolkit: from n/a through 3.4.4.
